name: DAV File
summary: Learn about .DAV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open and play DAV files with Dahua Smart Player (Windows), which is available as a standalone application or as part of Dahua Toolbox.
VidCoder can convert DAV files to .MP4 and .MKV video files. To convert a DAV file with VidCoder, follow these instructions:
Choose the DAV file you would like to convert.
Select Encoding settings and choose the settings in which you would like to encode the DAV file, which results in an MP4 or MKV file.
